pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lightweight Modern Responsive Card Component for 'shiny' // Responsive and modern 'HTML' card essentials for 'shiny' dashboard. This novel card component in 'Bootstrap' provides a flexible and extensible content container with multiple variants and options for build robust apps e.g for graph build or machine learning projects. The features rely on a combine 'JQuery' https://jquery.com and 'CSS' styles to improve the card functionality.
